question: It is permissible to have a therapeutic massage
answer:
QUESTION

Asalaamu alaikum

Would it be permissible to have a theraputic massage in the month of Ramadaan? This would be with a certified therapist/physio.

 

 

ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

 

It is permissible to have a therapeutic massage whilst fasting. As far as possible the therapist should be of the same gender.

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
